title: Amnesty warns 'human rights emergency' under Trump
shortDescription: Amnesty International warns of a 'human rights emergency' under President Trump with erosions in immigration enforcement and protest crackdowns.

title: Amnesty International warns of growing US authoritarianism under Trump
shortDescription: The human rights organization's report listed 12 "alarm bells" of the administration’s practices a year since Donald Trump began his second term.

title: Former sportscaster Michele Tafoya eyeing US Senate seat in Minnesota
shortDescription: Michele Tafoya, a Republican, is aiming to flip an open seat in Minnesota currently held by Democratic Sen. Tina Smith.

title: Poll finds many young Trump voters believe women 'should follow' men
shortDescription: A massive new survey finds Gen Z and millennial Trump voters think 'the man should lead' in relationships and want more 'masculinity' in U.S. culture.

title: Trump says US alone can protect Greenland
shortDescription: In a speech during the World Economic Forum annual meeting, the president made his case for making Greenland a U.S. territory.

title: Can Trump fire Fed's Lisa Cook? Supreme Court seems doubtful
shortDescription: The Supreme Court's decison on President Trump's abilty to fire a member of the Federal Reserve could have big consequences for the economy.

title: Trump 'won't use force,' calls for Greenland negotiations. Live
shortDescription: President Trump has doubled down on threats to take control of Greenland. He will partly use a trip to the World Economic Forum in Switzerland to further press his case amid deep European skepticism.

title: Air Force One with Trump forced to turn around after electrical issue
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said the aircraft turned around out of an an abundance of caution.

title: Demonstrators protest Trump across nation
shortDescription: Protesters appeared in cities across the U.S. as President Trump marked the first anniversary of his return to office.

title: Trump’s alleged Epstein note towers in DC
shortDescription: Activists displayed a 10-foot replica of Trump’s alleged birthday note to Epstein on the National Mall, sparking debate and visitor reactions.

title: Trump says he hopes Renee Good's father is still a 'fan'
shortDescription: President Trump said he hopes the father of Renee Good is still a 'Trump fan' after his daughter was shot and killed by an ICE agent.

title: Protesters rally on anniversary of Trump inauguration
shortDescription: On the one-year anniversary of President Donald Trump's inauguration of his second term, demonstrators took to the streets around the US to protest ICE.

title: Trump says ‘you’ll find out’ how far he'll go to take Greenland
shortDescription: The president has repeatedly declined to rule out military action against Denmark, the NATO member and US ally that controls Greenland.

title: Trump says NATO will be happy on Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told a reporter "you'll find out" how far he will go to acquire Greenland.

title: Congress just moved one big step closer to evading another shutdown
shortDescription: Lawmakers in Congress released their remaining funding bills meant to avoid a government shutdown after Jan. 30.
